scripts.build:frontend: cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && node scripts/copy-frontend.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build:all && npm run start
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:create && npm run db:init
scripts.db:clean-reports: psql -d $DB_NAME -c 'UPDATE generated_reports SET is_valid = false WHERE expires_at < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND is_valid = true;' && echo 'Reportes expirados marcados como inválidos (30 días de validez)'
scripts.db:list-reports: psql -d $DB_NAME -c 'SELECT id, evaluation_id, report_type, generated_at, expires_at, is_valid FROM generated_reports ORDER BY generated_at DESC;'
